title: Drums and Drumming
description: Drums and Drumming explores the many uses of drums from the past to the present. Readers learn about the origins of drums, how different drums are made, and some of the types of drums used around the world. Photographs enhance the text.
meta: ancient, cylinders, manufactured, percussion, rhythm, Taiko
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast different types of drums
Commas : Recognize various uses of commas

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
